item.description:
Annual Food Drive Party featuring The World Premier Band!

Join us once again for a great cause and a fun night of dancing to the The World Premier Band. Each year we collect and donate non-perishable items for "The St.Joseph's food pantry". Hundreds of people usually attend this and bring thousands of dollars worth of food for those in need!!

We've been to this event the past 4 years and have had a GREAT time! World Premier is an outstanding dance band (and one of my favorites) so you won't want to miss this one!

This year, the event is returning back to it's original venue (with a parking garage right across the street) - formerly known as Club 58, now known as the South Shore Music Hall!

TICKETS ARE NOW AVAILABLE!

$20 per ticket!

By Paypal to: perryp21t@comcast.net

Reserve by Phone or Email:

Call Perry: 781-492-5349 or781-963-2691

Email Perry: perryp21t@comcast.net

Â 

This is cross-posted in multiple meetup groups, please do not RSVP in more than 1 group so we can have an idea of headcount.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Annual Food Drive Fundraiser/Dancing to "World Premier Band" - Quincy (Adults)
